    public class DatabaseServicePreparedStatement
extends Object
implements MessagingService
    Abstracts away the Postgresql database.

      • getFirstMessage

        public Message getFirstMessage(int queue,
                      Client sender,
                      boolean remove)
        Description copied from interface: MessagingService
        Gets the oldest message waiting in the queue regardless of its priority.
        Specified by:
        getFirstMessage in interface MessagingService
        Parameters:
        queue - the queue to look at.
        sender - the client to fetch messages for.
        remove - if true, the message will be removed after being read; it will be left on the queue otherwise.
        Returns:
        The message; or null if there are no messages waiting for this client.

      • getMessageOfHighestPriority

        public Message getMessageOfHighestPriority(int queue,
                                  Client sender,
                                  boolean remove)
        Description copied from interface: MessagingService
        Gets the message of highest priority in the queue. If there are multiple messages of highest priority waiting, the oldest such message is returned.
        Specified by:
        getMessageOfHighestPriority in interface MessagingService
        Parameters:
        queue - the queue to look at.
        sender - the client to fetch messages for.
        remove - if true, the message will be removed after being read; it will be left on the queue otherwise.
        Returns:
        The message; or null if there are no messages waiting for this client.
